name: Retro Gears
description:
##### [HOT] Selected No.1 Hot Game in TouchArcade - the first week of 2016 #####

Reminiscence of retro racing game console.

Reinterpreted childhood car toys.


Tiny car over the screen was the bestest friend.

Toy machine reacting through little fingers of a child.

Memories remain, but advanced game play,

drive along with Retro Gears.


Key features:

- A sense of nostalgia with console UI

- Intuitive and easy control as playing with toy.

- Challenging your judgment, feel the speed.

- 10 of refined cars and upgrades.

- Booster activation in circumstances.

- Overcoming crisis with Nitro Jump.
